00758 class GfxEventFeature: public GfxFeature {
00759 public:
00760    typedef uint32 Date;
00761    typedef uint32 IDType;
00762    static const IDType INVALID_ID = MAX_UINT32;
00767    class StringType {
00768    public:
00769       typedef uint16 Type;
00770 
00771       StringType( Type type,
00772                   const MC2String& string ):
00773          m_type( type ),
00774          m_string( string ) {
00775       }
00776 
00778       Type getType() const {
00779          return m_type;
00780       }
00781 
00783       const MC2String& getString() const {
00784          return m_string;
00785       }
00786       bool operator == ( const StringType& other ) const {
00787          return
00788             getType() == other.getType() &&
00789             getString() == other.getString();
00790       }
00791    private:
00792       Type m_type; 
00793       MC2String m_string; 
00794    };
00795 
00796    typedef GfxPOIFeature::Categories Categories;
00797    typedef vector< StringType > Strings;
00798 
00799    explicit GfxEventFeature( const char* name = NULL );
00800 
00802    void addCategory( Categories::value_type category ) {
00803       m_categories.push_back( category );
00804    }
00805 
00807    void addString( const StringType& string ) {
00808       m_strings.push_back( string );
00809    }
00810 
00812    bool save( DataBuffer* data ) const;
00813 
00815    virtual bool createFromDataBuffer( DataBuffer* data );
00816 
00818    const Strings& getStrings() const {
00819       return m_strings;
00820    }
00821 
00823    const Categories& getCategories() const {
00824       return m_categories;
00825    }
00826 
00828    SizeType getSize() const;
00829 
00831    Date getDate() const {
00832       return m_date;
00833    }
00834 
00836    void setDate( Date date ) {
00837       m_date = date;
00838    }
00839 
00840    void setDuration( Date duration ) {
00841       m_duration = duration;
00842    }
00843 
00844    Date getDuration() const {
00845       return m_duration;
00846    }
00847 
00849    void setID( uint32 id ) {
00850       m_id = id;
00851    }
00852 
00854    IDType getID() const {
00855       return m_id;
00856    }
00857 
00858 private:

01321 inline bool 
01322 GfxFeature::getNameIsAbbreviated() const
01323 {
01324    return (m_drawTextStart & 0x8000000) == 0;
01325 }
01326 
01327 inline LangTypes::language_t 
01328 GfxFeature::getLangType() const
01329 {
01330    return LangTypes::language_t( m_drawTextStart & 0xffff );
01331 }
01332 
01333 inline void 
01334 GfxFeature::setLangType( LangTypes::language_t langType,
01335                          bool nameIsAbbreviated )
01336 {
01337    if ( ! nameIsAbbreviated ) {
01338       // Set the high bit.
01339       m_drawTextStart = 0x8000000;
01340    }
01341    m_drawTextStart |= (int) langType;
01342 }

01409 inline uint16 
01410 GfxTrafficInfoFeature::getAngle() const
01411 {
01412    // Convert from 0 - 255 to 0 - 359 degrees.
01413    return (uint16( m_angle/float64(255)*360 ));
01414 }
01415 
01416 
01417 inline void 
01418 GfxTrafficInfoFeature::setAngle(uint16 angle)
01419 {
01420    // Convert from 0 - 359 degrees to 0 - 255.
01421    m_angle = byte( (angle%360)/float64(360)*255 );
01422 }
